summary: The diff implements REQ-6 (contact information update) in both backend and frontend, but REQ-7 (logo display in header) is completely missing from the changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display the generated company logo prominently in the header component, replacing or supplementing the current header branding
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to frontend/src/components/Header.tsx were made. The header component was not modified to include the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated.
